localised_text.tooltip_text: Construct a new Gardens of Morr
Zoom to and open settlement panel with the Gardens of Morr selected

empty_slot.componentleveltooltip: A Gardens of Morr can be built at this location.

filled_slot.componentleveltooltip: A Gardens of Morr has been built at this location.||Select for option to deconstruct.

default.tooltip: Elspeth is not currently in this region

filled.name: filled
filled.tooltip: Elspeth is currently in this region.

filled_hover.tooltip: Elspeth is currently in this region

garden_cooldown.componentleveltooltip: Cooldown until a new Gardens of Morr can be established.

teleport_cooldown.componentleveltooltip: Cooldown until fast travel can be used again

tx_explanation.component_level_text:
[[i]]As part of her arcane learning, Elspeth spends time roaming between her Black Towers situated within the Gardens of Morr. Her magical storehouse travels with her, imbued with the ancient magic of Fozzrik to transport her forces and coveted artefacts.[[/i]]


[[col:green]]Friendly or neutral Empire-owned settlements known to Elspeth can be selected here to construct up to five Gardens of Morr.

[[col:green]]Once constructed, Elspeth and her army can travel instantly to a selected Gardens of Morr via the Fast Travel button.

[[col:green]]The Gardens of Morr also offer powerful buildings viewed in the Province Overview panel via the button to the right of the building icons.

[[col:green]]Select any existing Gardens for the option to deconstruct and make space for a Gardens at a different location.

garden_cooldown.componentleveltooltip: Cooldown until a new garden can be established

teleport_cooldown.componentleveltooltip: Cooldown until fast travel can be used again
